body.p: Mr Ochi voted against the publication of Clarifications to IFRS 15 Revenue from Contracts with Customers. He agrees with all of the clarifying amendments to IFRS 15 and the additional transition reliefs. However, he disagrees with the IASB’s decision to require entities to apply Clarifications to IFRS 15 retrospectively as if those amendments had been included in IFRS 15 at the date of initial application.
